attributes.action: stop the constant regualtion of comedy and broadcasting to a ridiculous degree of scrutiny by the minority.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Broadcasters and comedians are being scrutinised and put in the press for making jokes which are being, taking seriously, or, misinterpreted. 
As Nick Doody rightly states:
"You cant let the most easily offended people decide what the threshold should be for offence. If you let the person with the most sensitive taste buds order for everyone, your going to end up with the blandest thing on the menu."

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
